parameter.name: authToken
parameter.label: Auth_Token
parameter.description: This is the Authority Token used to communicate with the Konnected Module.

parameter.name: hostAddress
parameter.label: OpenHAB Address
parameter.description: The host address and port of openhab: example 192.168.1.180:8080. If blank the binding will auto determine the address based on the address and port the server is bound to.
